name: Air-Walker, Herald
effect: {Activate} ---> Exhaust target character with cost 3 or less. Use only during the build phase.
Unlike most heralds, Air-Walker utilizes his cosmic energy without an accompanying physical manifestation.

name: Battleworld, Secret Wars
effect:
Initiative:Alliance
Characters can't attack unless they team attack.
Objective:Alliance must cause breakthrough.

name: Bestow the Power Cosmic
effect: Search your deck for a character card with version Herald, reveal it, and put it into your hand.
"Rise and be reborn by the Power Cosmic - rise and take your place at my side."

name: Biosphere Boiler, Worldeater
effect:
Flip only if you haven't flipped another Worldeater location this turn.
{Activate} ---> Target player loses 2 endurance for each other Worldeater location you control.
"He has found what he seeks."

name: Broodworld, The Hive
effect:
Initiative:Alliance
When Broodworld is flipped, each player puts all Army character cards with cost 1 or less from his KO'd pile into play.
Objective:As the turn ends, all characters Galactus controls must be stunned.

name: Call in a Favor
effect: Each player may discard a card. If he does, he may search his deck for a character card that shares an affiliation with that card, reveal it, and put it into his hand.
It's good to keep someone around who can call for help if you need it. Or for pizza.

name: Common Bond
effect:
To play, dicard a card.
Characters with cost X get +X ATK this turn, where X is the cost of the card you discarded.

name: Daredevil, Kitchen Cleanser
effect: {Activate} ---> Remove any number of attackers from this attack. Lose endurance equal to the combined cost of characters removed this way.
"You guys bore me. Is there anything good on TV?"

name: Destroyer, Herald
effect: When Destroyer enters play, you may put any number of Army characters from your hand into play.
Mindless, soulless, emotionless - Destroyer serves Galactus well.

name: Doctor Doom, Power-Hungry
effect: While Dr. Doom is in combat, whenever an opponent plays a plot twist, you may turn target plot twist in your resource row face down.
Doom turns everything to his advantage.

name: Elanis, Home to Infant Terrible
effect:
Initiative:Alliance
When Elanis is flipped, each player can't recover characters during the recovery phase this turn unless all characters he controls are stunned.
Objective:Alliance must cause breakthrough while attacking a non-Army character.

name: Elemental Regulator, Worldeater
effect:
Flip only if you haven't flipped another Worldeater location this turn.
{Activate} ---> Gain 2 endurance for each other Worldeater location you control.
"His testing devices are sampling Earth's elemental composition."

name: Erebus, World of Anarchy
effect:
Initiative:Alliance
Whenever a character with cost 3 or less becomes stunned, KO it.
Objective:As the turn ends, all characters must be exhausted.

name: Firelord, Herald
effect: When Firelord becomes stunned, reveal the top card of your deck. Replace up to X face-up resources, where X is that card's cost.

name: Frankie Raye ~ Nova, Herald
effect: Whenever Frankie Raye stuns an opposing attacker or defender, you may stun a character with the same cost as that opposing character.
Nova is Galactus' herald, imbued with the Power Cosmic and stellar fire. Full of flame and fury, she means business!

name: Galactus, The Third Force of the Universe
effect:
Consume one [Planet Icon] ---> Gain 20 endurance. Use only during the combat phase.
Consume two [Planet Icon] ---> KO target character. Use only during the build phase.
Consume three [Planet Icon] ---> Remove target player from the game. Use only during the build phase.
"My journey has ended! This planet shall sustain me until it has been drained of all elemental life! SO SPEAKS GALACTUS!"

name: Green Goblin, Friend and Foe
effect:
Loyalty
Whenever a friendly character attacks a player directly, draw a card.
"Sanity is a small price to pay for power."

name: Grundar, The Tar Pit
effect:
Initiative:Alliance
Whenever a character attacks, its controller exhausts a ready character he controls.
Objective:Alliance must not take breakthrough.

name: Heart of the Machine, Worldeater
effect:
Flip only if you haven't flipped another Worldeater location this turn.
{Activate} ---> Target characters gets +1/+1 this turn for each other Worldeater location you control.
"The Earth is doomed!"

name: High Evolutionary, Intellectual Giant
effect:
Concealed
At the start of the build phase, each player draws a card.
Creating opportunities is what he does, one gene at a time.

name: Human Torch, Fiery Friend
effect: Pay X + X ATK this turn ---> Stun target character with DEF X or less. Use only during the combat phase and only of Human Torch has not been in combat this turn.
"You're fired."

name: Human Torch, Herald
effect: You and characters you control can't be the target of opposing effects.
"Hey, sis, I made Ben disappear...Now how do I bring him back?"

name: Infiltrate
effect: Ongoing: Characters you control can team attack protected characters.
"They'll never know what hit them."

name: Internal Injuries
effect:
Play only during the build phase.
Whenever target character becomes stunned this turn, its controller loses an additional 4 endurance.
The force of such a blow reverberates beyond the initial impact.

name: Kingpin, Overboss
effect: Leader: If Kingpin would become stunned, instead, you may stun an adjacent character.

name: Kn'Kn, Zero Gravity
effect:
Initiative:Alliance
All characters have flight.
Objective:As the turn ends, the Alliance must have caused more breakthrough than Galactus.

name: Luphom, Planet of Giants
effect:
Initiative:Galactus
All characters get +2/+2.
Objective:Identify the highest cost character Galactus controls as the combat phase starts. It must become stunned.

name: Morg, Herald
effect: Whenever an opponent plays a plot twist, you may KO target stunned character.
In his pre-herald life, Morg was an executioner. This was the same job on a cosmic scale.

name: Mr. Fantastic, Flexible Thinker
effect:
While Mr. Fantastic is in combat with an opposing character with cost 2 or less, he gets -4 / +4.
While Mr. Fantastic is in combat with an opposing character with cost 4 or more, he gets +4 / -4.
Reed is a scientist first, but he's not a bad tactician, either.

name: Nebulize, Epic
effect:
To play, exhaust a Galactus you control.
At the start of the combat phase this turn, each opponent KO's a character or resource he controls.
"Galactus is replenished. My limbs grow strong again."

name: New Korbin, Flame Planet
effect:
Initiative:Alliance
When New Korbin is flipped, stun all characters with cost 2 or less.
Objective:Alliance must cause breakthrough while attacking a character.

name: Nightcrawler, Hit Factory
effect: Whenever Nightcrawler stuns a defender, you may ready Nightcrawler. If you do, he can't cause breakthrough and can attack only characters with the same cost as that defender this turn.

name: Obliterate!, Epic
effect:
To play, exhaust a Galactus you control.
Target a character or location in play. At the start of the combat phase this turn, KO all copies of that card in play.
"Of what import are brief, nameless lives...to Galactus?"

name: Omnipotence
effect:
Play only during the build phase.
Choose a card name.
Ongoing: Plot twists with the chosen name, and the payment powers of cards with that name can't be used.
"Of course I know. How could it be otherwise?"

name: Pathetic Attempt
effect: Negate target effect targeting you or a card in play you control.
"Leave or stay, it does not matter! But seek not to interfere with the will of Galactus."

name: Proton Piston, Worldeater
effect:
Flip only if you haven't flipped another Worldeater location this turn.
{Activate} ---> Ready another target Worldeater location.
"The great sphere is opening!"

name: Punisher Squadron, Army
effect: Punisher Squadron gets +4 / +4 while you control seven or more resources.
The Punishers' credo is attack, auto-repair, adapt, and attack again.

name: Pyro, Hot Topic
effect: {Activate} ---> Target players loses 1 endurance for each resource he controls. Use only during the combat phase.

name: Red Shift, Herald
effect: {Activate} ---> Remove Red Shift from the game, then return him to play exhausted.

name: Ria, Home of the Kronans
effect:
Initiative:Galactus
Support row characters have reinforcement.
Objective:Identify the highest cost character Galactus controls as the combat phase starts. It must become stunned.

name: Saakar, Arena Planet of the Red King
effect:
Initiative:Alliance
When Saakar is flipped, return all Army characters Galactus controls to their owners' hands. For each Alliance player, Galactus returns any number of characters that player controls with combined cost 3 or less to their owners' hands.
Objective:As the turn ends, all characters Galactus controls must be stunned.

name: Silver Surfer's Board
effect:
Concealed-Optional
Equip only to Silver Surfer.
Exhaust Silver Surfer's Board ---> Put a cosmic counter on a cosmic character you control. You may move equipped character to your hidden or visible area.
"To me, my board."

name: Silver Surfer, Herald
effect: You can't lose endurance.
"And so they have sown the whirlwind, and reaped Armageddon! But, for all their blind savagery, still were they deserving of better than this!"

name: Silver Surfer, Last Zenn-Lavian
effect: When Silver Surfer enters play, target player puts the top card of his deck into his resource row face down. When Silver Surfer next leaves play, that player KO's a resource he controls.

name: Siphon Energy
effect: Choose a non-ongoing plot twist in any resource row. You may play it.
"What more do I do than that which any living creature must?"

name: Skrullos, Skrull Homeworld
effect: Skrullos has the text of the last planet flipped. If Skrullos is the first planet flipped, remove it from the game and flip another planet.

name: Spider-Man, New New Avenger
effect:
Reservist
Reveal Spider-Man from your resource row, choose an affiliation among characters you control ---> Crossover [Avengers Icon] and that affiliation this turn. Use only once per turn.

name: Stardust, Herald
effect: When Stardust enters play, target opponent chooses a player friendly to him. The chosen player KO's all characters he controls.
Stardust doesn't just hunt worlds. He hunts everyone who ever lived on them.

name: Strategic Thinking
effect: Whenever a character enters play this turn, put a +1 /+1 counter on it.
"Okay, this time we try it with a plan."

name: Sub-Atomica, Micro Planet
effect:
Initiative:Alliance
All characters get -2/-2.
Objective:Alliance must cause breakthrough.

name: Tamal, New Home of the Cotati
effect:
Initiative:Galactus
When Tamal is flipped, each player puts the top card of his deck into his resource row face down.
Objective:Identify the highest cost character Galactus controls as the combat phase starts. It must become stunned.

name: Tarnax IV
effect: {Activate}, Discard a card ---> Target character gets +1 ATK for each affiliation it has.
Skrulls will call in every favor to avenge the loss of their homeworld.

name: Taur, Dense Core
effect:
Initiative:Galactus
All characters lose and can't have flight.
At the start of the combat phase, the Alliance chooses an Alliance player. Galactus can attack only that player and characters he controls this turn.
Objective:Alliance must not take breakthrough.

name: Terrax, Herald
effect: Whenever Terrax defends against two or more characters, you may stun target character with cost 5 or less.
Terrax is quick to befriend...and quicker to betray.

name: The Fallen One, Herald
effect: When The Fallen One enters play, each opponent chooses a character he controls. Return all other opposing characters to their owners' hands.
His power comes from black matter, "the binding halo by which galaxies are made solvent."

name: This Bores Me
effect: Negate target plot twist or payment power.
"Galactus wearies of this endless combat."

name: Turbulis, Maze World
effect:
Initiative:Alliance
During the combat phase, players can't play plot twists with the same cost as another plot twist played this turn.
Objective:As the turn ends, all characters Galactus controls must be stunned.

name: Ultimate Nullifier, One-Way Trip
effect:
Concealed-Optional
Equipped character has "{Activate} ---> Negate target opposing payment or triggered effect."
"This thing will destroy the universe if you aim it in the wrong direction."

name: Venom, "Mac" Gargan
effect: Whenever Venom enters combat with an opponent or a character an opponent controls, he gets +1 ATK this attack for each card in that player's hand.
Now symbiotically attached to the former Scorpion, Venom is a whole new kind of dangerous.

name: You Dare?, Epic
effect:
To play, exhaust a Galactus you control.
Whenever target defender becomes stunned this attack, stun all characters that stunned it.
"You dare lay hands on one who can recreate you with but a passing whim?"

name: Your Planet Here, Planet
effect:
Initiative:
Game Text:

name: Zenn-La, Golden Age of Reason
effect:
Initiative:Alliance
Team attackers can't be stunned.
Objective:As the turn ends, the Alliance must control no stunned characters.
